title: Health Minister Mustafa Kamal calls on PM Shehbaz
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 1 (APP): Federal Minister for National Health Services Regulations and Coordination Syed Mustafa Kamal on Friday called on Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif here.Medical equipmentWellness retreats

In the meeting, the minister briefed the prime minister about the ongoing projects in the health sector as well as the progress in the reforms, according to a PM Office press release.

Moreover, they also discussed other matters related to the health ministry.
